verbs.description: During a [ARGM-MNR: highly] [V: publicized] [ARG1: event] at the White House on Monday , First Lady Melania Trump unveiled a campaign to keep children happy and healthy in today ’s hyperconnected , often unsettling world . The name of this lofty and laudable effort ? “ Be Best . ”
